abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes strengthening
            programs for major institutions responsible for agricultural
            policy and services. These programs consist of technical
            assistance, short term consultancies, joint
            Government-consultant policy reviews, training, study tours,
            and equipment and supplies. The project supports sector
            policy analysis, public expenditure analysis, parastatal
            monitoring and restructuring, personnel management,
            information systems, and extension systems for the Ministry
            of Agricultural Production and Agrarian Reform (MPARA). It
            furthermore supports sector policy analysis, public
            expenditure analysis, personnel management, parastatal
            monitoring, facilities management and information systems
            for the Ministry of Livestock, Fisheries and Forestry
            (MPAEF). Finally, the project supports activities in
            research planning and programming for the Ministry of
            Scientific and Technological Research (MRSTD), the National
            Center for Applied Research on Rural Development (F OF IFA)
            as well as natural resources inventory; land use analysis
            and monitoring for MRSTD.
